title: How the fuck my account's password has been changed without my permission
body: How the fuck my account's password has been changed without my permission. And also related email also has been changed so that i cant receive my recovery mail OMG. How to get back my original account!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

replies.body: It sounds like an unauthorized access for sure, so be sure to run through our [account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide to secure your info in and outside of League.  I couldn't really say for sure how it might have happened, but we got your back!  Reach out to our account team through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), and we'll help with recovery and updating your information.  Hang tihgt!
